name: Apple Pro Display XDR
description: 32-inch 6K reference monitor with 1600 nits peak HDR brightness. Features nano-texture glass option, P3 wide color, and XDR (Extreme Dynamic Range) for professional workflows.

reviews.review_text: Reference grade display at fraction of reference monitor cost.
XDR brightness for HDR mastering is essential.
Stand sold separately is annoying but display is incredible.
